:: Wolfgang ::

:: The plasma shots all make direct hits with Wolfgang. Wolfgang transforms 
to bot mode and stands up. ::

All right. I get it. I cant escape. But like a true warrior, i want an  
honorable death, for i will never join the forces of your predicon scum.

:: Thinks for a second ::

I wont join the maximal scum either.

:: Slowly puts himself into self-prepared stasis lock. ::
